thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 12 of 61
thread.title: Azran

author: Azran
title: Azran
text:
Good selection and pricing, with free duty/tax inclusive shipping. Provides detailed measurements of the clothing. Has no-nonsense and easy to use website. Ample product photos and descriptions... everything that I wish for an online shop. Ssense is perfect.
Only thing that I could ask for.. Maybe photos of average sized models wearing the clothing in addition. It helps me decide whether the ripped at the knee is at the right place.
